release.description: Enzyme synonyms in JSON; RHEA: prefix for xrefs
release.action: Added synonyms to the JSON returned for a serial EC number.
Added RHEA: prefix to the accession_number of Rhea links in IntEnzXML.
Updated to intenz-translator-1.0.12.
Restablished exception catching removed by mistake in the previous release, which allows going on with other entries if there is some problem during XML marshalling.
Updated to latest versions of rhea-mapper and biobabel-core.
Added cml schema to the output directory (script).
Added interface IntenzExporter for exporters, and a new implementation JsonExporter to be used by webapps.

Deprecated methods from XmlExporter taking release number and date as parameters, as they don't conform to the interface and are not needed for every exporter implementation. In this case, they can be set using the accessor methods.
Moved dependency on Oracle driver to the apps profile and test scope, avoiding its inclusion in the jar package.
Updated to latest version of parent, intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-translator, rhea-mapper and javax.mail.
Removed unused files from the jar file, including a log4j.xml which produced a rogue log file from the web services in the server.
Added an 'apps' profile to use for releases (the packaged jar artifact is also used by the web services, but does not need any log4j or database configuration files).
Updated to latest version of intenz-mapper, intenz-biopax and intenz-xml - which add IUBMB flags - and intenz-translator.
Added IUBMB flag to IntEnzXML (as attribute for plain text reactions, or as label for Rhea reactions exported as CMLReact).
Updated to latest versions of intenz-xml, which fixes issue with IntEnzXML validation in LDCs.

release.description: Urgent update to fix CML issue
release.action: Updated to latest versions of rhea-cml, which avoids troublesome formulae (non compliant with CMLReact schema).

release.description: Rhea reactions in CML for IntEnzXML
release.action: Added Rhea reactions as CML.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-xml - which allows reactions to be included as CML -, intenz-mapper and intenz-translator.
Added dependency on rhea-cml to export Rhea reactions as CMLReact within IntEnzXML.
Updated to latest version of intenz-biopax - which uses latest rhea-biopax, fixing an issue with BioPAX export related to the citations data model.

release.description: Methods gone public; bug fix; dependencies update
release.action: XmlExporter constructor is now public, usable from other packages. Also, ExporterApp.getDescriptions is now public and static, with one parameter.
Ampershands are now escaped in link elements.

Updated to latest version of intenz-mapper - which fixes a bug resulting in failed exports for EC numbers with modified versions -, intenz-database, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper, biobabel-db, log4j and junit.
Closing output stream for every XML file avoids the "too many open files" error.

Updated to latest version of intenz-mapper, intenz-xml (which adds ChEBI IDs to cofactors), intenz-translator, intenz-biopax (which uses proper URIs for RDF IDs), intenz-database, rhea-domain and rhea-mapper.
Fixed script (compression of exported files).
Updated to latest version of parent (intenz), intenz-mapper, intenz-translator, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper and biobabel-db.
Reinstated method to get back xchars markup instead of escaped text.
Release number and date are taken from the database now, instead of the properties file.
Output directories are created if not there.
This module is now deployed to the repository.
Fixed bug which left unescaped ampershands in the XML file, by using non-deprecated API.
Added exporter for KEGG enzyme flat file.
Added command line options to ExporterApp.
Updated to latest version of dependencies.
Removed links to Rhea when the reaction is not public.
Updated to latest version of intenz (parent), intenz-mapper, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper, biobabel-db, xercesImpl, javax.mail, log4j and junit.
Fixed addition of links to XML (no 'links' element added when there are none to add).
Updated to latest version of intenz-mapper, rhea-domain and rhea-mapper.
Updated to latest version of intenz-xml, which fixes a bug in the generation of the whole-tree XML.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-biopax, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper and biobabel-db modules.
Fixed script for SQL dump.

release.description: Cross references to Rhea from IntEnzXML
release.action: Added cross references to Rhea from IntEnzXML.
Updated to latest versions of domain and xml modules.

Updated dependencies on rhea-mapper - which fixes potential issue with the new ChEBI database server layout -, intenz-xml - which adds a new attribute to better distinguish preliminary EC numbers - and intenz-biopax - which fixes issue with missing EC numbers.
Fixed direction symbol in XCHARS export.
Added support for preliminary EC numbers in exported files.
Updated dependencies on rhea.domain, rhea.mapper, intenz.mapper and biobabel.db modules.
Moved XML schema and generated code to a new independent module (intenz-xml).
Updated dependencies on rhea.domain, rhea.mapper, intenz.mapper and biobabel.db modules.
Added BioPAX export.
Fixed export of fields containing xchars markup: it is not enclosed in CDATA sections anymore, and xchars tags take their namespace prefix.
Updated dependency to latest mapper, translator and biobabel.db modules.
Updated dependencies to latest mapper (and domain) module.
Updated dependency to latest mapper module.
